name: diepcustom
description: An open source diep.io custom private-server template

scripts.server: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.docker:start: docker run --pull never --rm --publish ${PORT:-8080}:8080 --env PORT=8080 --env DEV_PASSWORD_HASH --env SERVER_INFO --env NODE_ENV --init --interactive --tty diepcustom
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:start
